Run on the most advanced quantum systems

Qiskit gives you access to IBM's fleet of utility-scale quantum systems, as well as hardware from many third-party providers.

View IBM Quantum systemsSee other providers

A growing global community, powered by Qiskit

Contributors

Explore the ecosystem

Find projects, tools, utilities, libraries, and tutorials from a large community of developers and researchers.

Contribute to our codebase

Join Qiskit's active open-source community and discover ways to contribute via GitHub.

Join our community on Slack

Connect with over 30,000 Qiskitters around the world in the Qiskit Slack.

Attend an event

Meet and exchange ideas with practitioners worldwide at Qiskit community events.

Join the Qiskit advocate program

We support people all over the world who contribute to the Qiskit community.
